synopsis.text:
Meowth's plans for mischief are put on hold when he stumbles upon a spooky Ghost Festival filled with Ghost Pokémon and other creatures like Koffing, Lickitung, and Cubone. Meanwhile, Pikachu and his pals, while out on a picnic, also happen upon the same festival. Instead of being scared, Pikachu befriends the ghostly inhabitants, and together, they devise a plan to scare Meowth away and ensure the Ghost Festival remains a fun and safe place for all its spectral attendees.

In this exciting anime episode, Pikachu and friends discover a haunted festival filled with Ghost Pokémon and other creatures, including Ditto and Lickitung. As they explore the eerie event, they must team up with the ghostly inhabitants to chase away an unwelcome guest - Meowth! With Pikachu's bravery and some unexpected alliances, this Ghost Festival turns into an unforgettable adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
